Package cs1302.game

Class MinesweeperGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs1302.game.MinesweeperGame
  • public class MinesweeperGame
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the Minesweeper Game.

    • Method Detail

      • play

        public void play()
        This method provides the main game loop by invoking other instance methods, as needed.

      • readSeed

        public void readSeed()
        Reads the seed file that dictates the row, col, and mines instance variables.

      • createGrid

        public void createGrid()
        Uses the seed ArrayList to set rows, cols, and numMines. Also creates the grid, gridMines, and noFodGrid arrays. Sets the mines' positions in the array.

      • printMinefield

        public void printMinefield()
        Method used to print the current minefield.

      • printDisplay

        public void printDisplay()
        Method used to print the game display to standard output. Calls upon the printMinefield() method.

      • printWelcome

        public void printWelcome()
        Prints the welcome banner that appears at game startup.

      • printWin

        public void printWin()
        Used to print the win message to standard output.

      • printLoss

        public void printLoss()
        Used to print the game over message to standard output.

      • reveal

        public void reveal​(java.util.Scanner inputScan)
        Method used to trigger the reveal command by the user. Takes in a Scanner object to give values to revealRow) and revealCol.
        Parameters:
        inputScan - the Scanner passed into the method from promptUser()

      • mark

        public void mark​(java.util.Scanner inputScan)
        Method used to trigger the mark command by the user. Takes in a Scanner object to give values to markRow) and markCol.
        Parameters:
        inputScan - the Scanner passed into the method from promptUser()

      • guess

        public void guess​(java.util.Scanner inputScan)
        Method used to trigger the reveal command by the user. Takes in a Scanner object to give values to guessRow) and guessCol.
        Parameters:
        inputScan - the Scanner passed into the method from promptUser()

      • help

        public void help()
        Method used to trigger the help command by the user. Print out all command options to standard output.

      • quit

        public void quit()
        Method used to trigger the quit command by the user. Quits the game and exits program gracefully.

      • printNoFog

        public void printNoFog()
        Prints the "no fog" minefield which reveals all mines.

      • promptUser

        public void promptUser()
        Prints the game prompt to standard output and interprets user input from standard input.

      • isRevealed

        public boolean isRevealed​(int row,
                          int col)
        Method used to determine if a space is revealed or not.
        Parameters:
        row - the row that we want to check.
        col - the column that we want to check.
        Returns:
        returns true is space is revealed.

      • isWon

        public boolean isWon()
        Returns true if, and only if, all conditions are met to win the game.
        Returns:
        returns true if numMines equals minesFlagged and if spacesRevealed equals spaces.

      • incorrectCommand

        public void incorrectCommand()
        Prints invalid command message to standard output.

      • getScore

        public double getScore()
        Calculates and returns the score for the player.
        Returns:
        returns the double score.
